This is the main website where you can find all lab related materials. This website is developed and maintained by [Dr. Fuzhen Yin](https://www.gis-social.org/) from the department of [Geography & Environmental Studies](https://ges.uccs.edu/) at [UCCS](https://www.uccs.edu/).
